divs: sighting detailswhile sitting in the spa i usually stare at the sky and tonight there were winds up to 20mph with mostly cloudy skies. there was heavy light pollution (orange glow). while watching a break in the clouds i saw 2 disc-like objects in formation one on the right and one following at the leading object���s 7 o���clock at approximately 100 feet. the objects were heading from north to south towards san diego international airport. the speed is estimated at maybe 750 to 900 knots. the objects were only visible from the reflective orange glow of the city lights, this suggests a metallic surface. the objects appeared to be just above the cloud ceiling of about 1000ft. objects were nearly the length of a boeing 737 from estimation. objects had no lights of any kind emitting from what i could see. the fact that mcas miramar is a few miles away should be taken into consideration. but the speed, lack of required wing lights\strobes and extremely close proximity to a major airport suggests that the military is not responsible. i don't know why i have always looked at the sky, it's been a hobby\habit of mine since childhood. only recently have i started seeing unknown objects. this is the 2nd sighting i have witnessed in less than 2 months, both times were purely coincidence. (i.e. looking up in the right place at the right time for a few seconds) i feel excited and highly enthusiastic about witnessing\learning about my, and other people's sightings or experiences.
trends: There have been 151 other sightings in San Diego
There was one other sighting in San Diego on or around April 8th 2008
Summary: 2 disc-like objects where flying in formation
